svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.17 Chrome/130.0.6723.191 Electron/33.3.2 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17"> <diagram name="Nemlig API Architecture" id="nemlig-api"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="976" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="0" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1000" pageHeight="600" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="title" value="Nemlig.com backend API" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="30" width="257" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_title" value="Authentication (sequential)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="70" width="180" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth1" value="GET /webapi/AntiForgery" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=11;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="100" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth2" value="GET /webapi/Token" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=11;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="100" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth3" value="POST /webapi/login" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=11;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="100" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_arrow1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="auth1" target="auth2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_label1" value="XSRF token" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#666666;" parent="auth_arrow1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-10" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_arrow2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="auth2" target="auth3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_label2" value="Bearer token" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontSize=9;fontColor=#666666;" parent="auth_arrow2" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-10" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="session" value="Session cookies
(.ASPXAUTH)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;fontSize=10;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="100" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="auth_arrow3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="auth3" target="session" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="host1" value="nemlig.com/webapi/*" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=26;fillColor=#dae8fc;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="180" width="340" height="208" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_basket" value="Basket" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=10;" parent="host1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="26" width="340" height="46" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_b1" value="GET /basket/GetBasket
POST /basket/AddToBasket" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="h1_basket" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="20" width="340" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_order" value="Orders" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=10;" parent="host1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="72" width="340" height="46" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_o1" value="GET /order/GetBasicOrderHistory
GET /v2/order/GetOrderHistory/{id}" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="h1_order" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="20" width="340" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_checkout" value="Checkout" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=10;" parent="host1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="118" width="340" height="46" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_c1" value="GET /Checkout/GetCreditCards
POST /Order/PlaceOrderLoggedIn" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="h1_checkout" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="20" width="340" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_page" value="Page Data (SSR)" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=20;fillColor=#dae8fc;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=10;" parent="host1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="164" width="340" height="44" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h1_p1" value="GET /{path}?GetAsJson=1 (product details, page content)" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="h1_page" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="20" width="340" height="24" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="host2" value="webapi.prod.knl.nemlig.it/searchgateway/api/*" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=26;fillColor=#d5e8d4;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=0;marginBottom=0;strokeColor=#82b366;fontSize=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="180" width="320" height="72" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h2_s1" value="GET /quick?query=... (autocomplete suggestions)" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="host2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="26" width="320" height="22" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="h2_s2" value="GET /search?query=...&take=20&skip=0 (full results)" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rotatable=0;fontSize=10;" parent="host2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="48" width="320" height="24" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="headers" value="Required Headers:
• Authorization: Bearer {token}
• X-XSRF-TOKEN: {xsrf}
• X-Correlation-Id: {uuid}
• Platform: web
• Version: 11.201.0" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fillColor=#dae8fc;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=10;fontColor=#333333;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="280" width="160" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="response" value="Response Format:
• JSON with nested objects
• Products, Facets, Recipes
• Pagination via skip/take
• Timestamps for cache" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#82b366;fillColor=#d5e8d4;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=10;fontColor=#333333;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="600" y="280" width="150" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
Response Format:
• JSON with nested objects
• Products, Facets, Recipes
• Pagination via skip/take
• Timestamps for cache

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
